== 中断向量表 ==
|*地址*|*异常种类*|
|FFFF0000|复位|
|FFFF0004|未定义指令|
|FFFF0008|软中断（swi）|
|FFFF000C|Prefetch abort|
|FFFF0010|Data abort|
|FFFF0014|保留|
|FFFF0018|IRQ|
|FFFF001C|FIQ|
该向量表定义在kernel/arch/arm/kernel/entry-armv.S
